document_title: FortiWLC PAM.log authenticated user information exposure

note.text: The pam.log file generated by FortiWLC contains authenticated users credentials (local admin and users authenticated against external servers). Users with admin privileges can access the pam.log file and read the credentials.
note.title: Summary

note.text: The pam.log file generated by FortiWLC contains authenticated users credentials (local admin and users authenticated against external servers). Users with admin privileges can access the pam.log file and read the credentials.
note.title: Description

note.text: Depending on your version, apply the following patches:Below 6.1-2-29Update to 7.0-10-0 or above, and apply the corresponding patch.6.1-2-29meru-6.1-2-29-patch-bug03882497.0-9-1:meru-7.0-9-1-patch-bug03882497.0-10-0:meru-7.0-10-0-patch-bug03882498.0-5-0:meru-8.0-5-0-patch-bug03882498.1-2-0:meru-8.1-2-0-patch-bug03882498.2-4-0:meru-8.2-4-0-patch-bug0388249
note.title: Solutions

acknowledgment.description: Fortinet is pleased to thank University of Toronto for reporting this vulnerability under responsible disclosure.Ã‚Â
